educations.schoolName: Michigan State University College of Law

headline: Summer Associate at Giamarco Mullins & Horton P.C.
summary: Rising 3L student at Michigan State College of Law. Indigenous Law Scholarship recipient and admitted candidate for the Indigenous Law Certificate Program. Member of the Geoffrey Fieger Trial Practice Institute. Experience in immigration law and tax law, but also interested in real estate law.

positions.description:
PK Contracting, Inc. is a private company specializing in pavement markings in Michigan. 
Removed and replaced aged pavement markings. Operated specialized equipment. Directed traffic to create a safe work environment.
positions.title: Laborer

positions.description: Yoga State is a yoga and spin studio designed to improve physical and mental health. Conducted business transactions with students and logged student information. Taught students proper breathing techniques and physical postures to improve flexibility, stamina, and promote relaxation.
positions.title: Teacher

positions.description: Childers Shkreli P.L.L.C. is a small firm practicing a variety of areas of law such as immigration, family, and criminal. Conducted client and counsel communication. Drafted and filed court pleadings. Updated office information. Wrote for the firm's blog based on current local and national court cases.
positions.title: Law Clerk
